mapper.sql: shiid, bid, xiangmuname, renshu, gongzi, shichang, shuifei, fangzu, waibao, zhaodaifei, tongxunfei, riyongpin, youjifei, zuchefei, shebeixiuli, gaosutongxing, chuchaijiayou, shineigongjiao, xiuchefei, rengong, shuidian, chepiao, qita, jieguo,time
mapper.update: UPDATE ys.shisuan SET bid =#{bid} , xiangmuname = #{xiangmuname} , renshu = #{renshu} , gongzi = #{gongzi} , shichang = #{shichang} , shuifei = #{shuifei} , fangzu = #{fangzu} , waibao = #{waibao} , zhaodaifei = #{zhaodaifei} , tongxunfei = #{tongxunfei} , riyongpin = #{riyongpin} , youjifei = #{youjifei} , zuchefei = #{zuchefei} , shebeixiuli =#{shebeixiuli} , gaosutongxing = #{gaosutongxing} , chuchaijiayou =#{chuchaijiayou} , shineigongjiao = #{shineigongjiao} , xiuchefei = #{xiuchefei} , rengong = #{rengong} , shuidian = #{shuidian} , chepiao = #{chepiao} WHERE shiid = #{shiid} ;
mapper.insert: insert into shisuan (shiid, bid, xiangmuname, renshu, gongzi, shichang, shuifei, fangzu, waibao, zhaodaifei, tongxunfei, riyongpin, youjifei, zuchefei, shebeixiuli, gaosutongxing, chuchaijiayou, shineigongjiao, xiuchefei, rengong, shuidian, chepiao, qita, jieguo,`time` ) values (#{shiid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xiangmuname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{renshu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gongzi,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shichang,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shuifei,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fangzu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waibao,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zhaodaifei,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tongxunfei,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{riyongpin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{youjifei,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zuchefei,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shebeixiuli,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gaosutongxing,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chuchaijiayou,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shineigongjiao,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{xiuchefei,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rengong,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{shuidian,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{chepiao,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{qita,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{jieguo,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{time,jdbcType=DATE} )
